https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jNCvJuLbHjvXPvyOubbaa54ArvH.jpg When odd reports are received through official channels stating that the President of the United States is being held captive on a secret international moon base called Vegan and that he has been replaced on Earth by a clone, the US Marshall Service immediately sends their 'best' man, Dix, on the mission. 2001: A Space Travesty
